item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description:
true

This page provides an example of using R Markdown.

x <- 1:10
y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2)
df <- data.frame(x, y)
df
##     x     y
## 1   1  2.49
## 2   2  2.34
## 3   3  1.88
## 4   4  3.85
## 5   5  5.06
## 6   6  6.61
## 7   7  6.15
## 8   8  9.84
## 9   9  9.11
## 10 10 10.86

item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description:
true

This page provides an example of using R Markdown.

x <- 1:10
y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2)
df <- data.frame(x, y)
df
##     x    y
## 1   1 0.55
## 2   2 0.79
## 3   3 3.09
## 4   4 3.54
## 5   5 6.03
## 6   6 7.52
## 7   7 8.03
## 8   8 8.27
## 9   9 8.81
## 10 10 9.19

item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description:
true

This page provides an example of using R Markdown.

x <- 1:10
y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2)
df <- data.frame(x, y)
df
##     x    y
## 1   1 0.75
## 2   2 3.36
## 3   3 2.37
## 4   4 3.50
## 5   5 5.34
## 6   6 6.49
## 7   7 5.85
## 8   8 6.12
## 9   9 8.09
## 10 10 9.41
